title: Pax Returns!
body:
I learned from my last post that Pax Sivir is unobtainable indefinitely and recovered from my depression. Besides Warden/Snowstorm there aren't any nontribal skins that let her stand out. I still want a neo-techie modern skin for an adc kinda like Pulsefire EZ, but more like Pax Sivir. .... what options do we have? hmmm

Can we all just make a huge outcry to Riot to make this amazing skin becoming available again? I'm sure there are other Sivir mains in the closet out there secretly wishing upon a star that Pax returns from neverland and grants us awesome gameplay visuals. Here's her video and you can see how that skin stands out from most any other in the game. The contrast is palpable. 
We need it back Riot! Please give us Pax! :D
[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CT-vFyICaWo)

replies.body:
Heya Bobajet! 

Unfortunately, we don't have plans to bring back the PAX skins.
That would just recreate the problem all over again.
the problem is that the skin has been vaulted for 4 years. another opportunity to win or buy it would be welcome.
True a Sivir Project skin would be amazing! Even a Dragonslayer or Arcade or Mecha skin would be ridiculous. She has really missed alot of important skin packs.

> [{quoted}](name=Bobajet,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=EEQHzT5E,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-12T14:37:14.817+0000)
>
> True a Sivir Project skin would be amazing! Even a Dragonslayer or Arcade or Mecha skin would be ridiculous. She has really missed alot of important skin packs.

she's human so she wouldn't get mecha, project would be cool though. awhile ago the posted the "requirements" for mecha, battlecast, and project skins.
I think she'd make a good PROJECT project. I like Snowstorm (and Victorious) though.
